recipe.title: Ceviche Marinated Scallops
ingredients: 1 pound perfectly fresh sea scallops or a mixture of fish, cut into 1/4-inch dice
Chopped fresh cilantro leaves for garnish
instructions: 1. Toss together all the ingredients except the cilantro and let sit at room temperature for 15 minutes. 2. Taste, adjust the seasoning, and serve, garnished with the cilantro.
